name: Autism Community Services Inc.
specialty: Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Autism Community Services Inc. is a Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Edison, NJ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $20.3M in Medicaid payments across 40K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $20.3M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
